meanings.definition: A region of injured tissue or skin in which blood capillaries have been ruptured; a bruise.
meanings.sent1: After the fall, he had painful contusions on his arm.
meanings.sent2: The contusions on her leg turned purple and yellow as they healed.
meanings.sent3: The contusions on the banana made it look like a bruised fruit.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it was covered in emotional contusions after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The contusions on the car's bumper were evidence of the accident.

meanings.sent1: The contusions on his skin were caused by the impact.
meanings.sent2: She winced at the contusions forming on her arm.
meanings.sent3: The contusions on the apple happened when it fell from the tree.
meanings.sent4: His words left emotional contusions on her heart.
meanings.sent5: The contusions on the paper showed how roughly it had been handled.
